thread.section_title: Kiwi Drug Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiwi Drug | kiwidrug.com
thread.title: JOC

author: JOC
title: JOC
text: I have shopped for several years with KIWI and have nothing but praises for them. Even though I live in Maine, USA, Kiwi beats the price (including shipping) of a daily medication that I need. On top of that I have always received my orders in a very reasonable amount of time, frequently more rapidly than orders placed here in the U.S. I am truly appreciative of their service, products, and prices!
